Tickets ( 6d . and 3d . ) and bills for Miss Gawthorpe's meeting on Saturday , 19th , can be had at the office . The chair will
be taken by the Lord Provost Urquhart .

Mrs. Phillips is giving a Musical At Home at Hockley House on Saturday , March 19 , in aid of funds and to introduce the subject of Votes for Women to those at present not sufficiently interested to come to meetings .
Description: Musical At Home; in aid of funds

Scottish members are looking forward to the great event of April 28 , 29 , and 30 - namely , the Scottish Exhibition and Sale of Work , which will take place on these dates in the Charing Cross Halls , Glasgow .
Description: Scottish Exhibition and Sale of Work
